data.title: Query to determine which customer invoices are subjected to apply payment

qas.question: Hi you all experts. I have two tables (OINV and a custom made named DEPOSITS) the first one as you know keeps the record of all customer invoices. The second one keeps record of last payment from customers (this table is filled before applying payments and it consists in only two fields: ClientID and Amount. I will upload incoming payments through DTW, but since I only have the amount of the payment and not the invoices to where this money will be posted; I come to you for advice. For instance, my Customer1 just pay 5,000USD and has following invoices (in order of DueDate): - InvoiceA: 1,000 - InvoiceB: 700 - InvoiceF: 3,000 - InvoiceD: 5,000 - InvoiceC: 10,000 I need to create a query that gaves me wich Invoice (with the higher due date) can be cover with the amount given, and if cannot be covered completely, to apply the remaining balance of the Deposit and keep the invoice open as partial paid. The expected result from this would be: - Invoice A: 1,000 PAYED. Remaining balance of payment 4,000USD. - Invoice B: 700 PAYED. Remaining balance of payment 3,300USD (4000-700) - InvoiceF: 3,000 PAYED. Remaining balance of payment 300USD (3300-3000) - InvoiceD: 300 PARTIALLY PAYED. Remaining balance of payment 0USD (300-300) Thanks a lot, Israel.

answers.text: Hi Israel, Query may only do calculation column wise easily. How about just create left part. The calculation between lines can be done by Excel formula after export the query result. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: Which activity is required in PA30 to block the deletion right

qas.question: Hi, I have a requirement to block the deletion right from PA30.User can maintain the reocrd update the record and change the record but he should not able to delete the record So i have checked the Authorization level under P_ORGIN and found the either L or * is required for delition rights. In my case in PA30 we have given this to user with below authorization level. P_PRGIN Authorization Level M,E,R,S,W So i have not given either L or * but still the user is able to delete the record from PA30. In F1 help under P_ORGIN the same information i have found, but not able to understand the actual authorization object and activity which control this. Regards, Subhash

answers.text: As far as I am aware, Auth Level = W is sufficient for most deletions (it is unfortunate that it cover most change events too). Looking at the SAP Help, Auth Level = L is only related to Statements, is this where the problem is or is it general data in PA30?

data.title: Need of WCM and in which modules we can implement

qas.question: Hi Guys, I am very new to WCM, this we are using to get approvals for the certain stages of task before completing. I want to know where this WCM can be used in PM & PS, as per my knowledge this can be used in PM and PS. Is there any other moudles are there to integrate with WCM and how?? Thanks, Bhanu

answers.text: Hi, WCM is not separate module its a part of Plant Maintenance(PM) module. Its deals with Safety of work & environment, permits,Lockout/Tagout for Maintenance Order etc.... For more details: http://help.sap.com/saphelp_47x200/helpdata/en/aa/df293581dc1f79e10000009b38f889/frameset.htm http://help.sap.com/saphelp_47x200/helpdata/en/aa/df293581dc1f79e10000009b38f889/frameset.htm regards, Venkatesan Anandan Edited by: Venkatesan Anandan on Feb 16, 2009 10:44 AM

data.title: Reversal of a maint. order which was released through a maintenance plan?

qas.question: Hi All, Is there a way to do reversal of a maintenance order that was released through a maintenance plan? Because I do not want to process the order; as such I would like to put a reversal indicator for that order and go ahead with the next order that was called through a maintenance plan. If YES, kindly let me know how to do it? Many thanks in advance. Kannan J

answers.text: hi kannan it is not possible to reverse the order once it has released, if you dont want to proceed you can lock the order.you can also specfiy in IMG the order should be called in NON releasing condition , so that you have the control of it. You can also skip the maintenance plan provided it has not called regards thyagarajan

data.title: Need a query in which I can get list of AR invoice paid with cheques

qas.question: Hello all, I need a query in which i can get list of AR invoice paid with cheques, and where it should display, cheque number , cheque amount , amount applied to invoice, BP code and other details

answers.text: You can get it by using query, check the below one SELECT distinct T0.[DocNum] [Payment No.], T1.[CardCode] [Customer Code], T1.[CardName] [Customer Name], T0.[CheckNum][Cheque No.], T0.[DueDate], T0.[BankCode] [Bank Code], T0.[Currency] [Cheque Currency], CASE T1.[PayNoDoc] WHEN 'y' THEN 'Y' WHEN 'N' THEN ' ' ELSE 'error' END [Payment On Account], T0.[CheckSum][Cheque Amount], T3.DocNum [Invoice No.], T1.[ShowAtCard] [Cust. Ref No.], T3.DocTotal [Invoice Total], T2.[SumApplied] [Applied Amount], T1.[DocCurr] [Invoice Currency], T1.DocRate FROM RCT1 T0 INNER JOIN ORCT T1 ON T0.DocNum = T1.DocNum Left outer JOIN RCT2 T2 ON T0.DocNum = T2.DocNum and T1.DocNum = T2.DocNum Left outer JOIN OINV T3 on T2.DocEntry = T3.DocEntry WHERE T0.[DueDate] = [%0]

data.title: 781084 - Cannot add document which needs approval to a Service Call

qas.question: Hi Experts, Is there any update on this error per SAP Note 781084? Symptom: When linking a sales document, which needs to be approved via an approval procedure, to a Service Call under the Expenses tab page, the document will not be displayed in the Service Call window after its approval. Cause Definition problem. Solution A DRQ number 3383528 was opened. IM 2653636. I am now using 8.82 version and the issue still exist. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, Don

answers.text: You can add the document to the service call once it has been approved. For instance: 1) Create service call 2) go to Expense tab, create a new Sales Order 3) Sales Order goes to Approver (at this point, the sales order doesn't appear on the expense tab) 4) When the Sales Order has been approved and added to the system, go back to the Service Call > Expense Tab > > Expense Details > New Document > Order 5) At this point, the Sales Order window opens in Add Mode. Press Ctrl-F, and go to the Approved Sales Order. Click OK. 6) the Sales Order should appear on the expenses tab in the Service Call. Hope this helps. Reza

data.title: When to use Tables, which are defined as u0093No Objectu0094?

qas.question: Generally, in which situations should we use a “no object type ” table ? There’s not much explanation about that type in help files.

answers.text: Hello, the possibility to define a type for table is new with version 2004. Before, all the table where defined as "no Object type" "No Object Type" tables are tables not used in UDO (User Defined Object). They are the "defaut type" table in Business one, You can access to them using the UserTables object, select/insert/remove/update record using this object If you choose ono of the available object type (master data, master data line....) theses table are created as UDO tables. Sebastien

data.title: Require drop down in eRecruitment - Application wizard ( which is created)

qas.question: Hi, I have created a process template exclusively for new requirement and in the process template I have defined extra tab like Preferred country to work and I have defined the scales and assigned the parameter too in the R/3.Here when the question is defined and the Pre-defined scale(i.e: country) has been selected and assigned in the Questionnaire maintenance.After Job Posting when the external candidate applies for the job and when he tries to enter the preferred country the list shows with radio button instead of drop down values.Here the country list goes upto 160... Please suggest ways to provide it in drop down values. Thanks

answers.text: You have to do a configuration part in R/3 system.In R/3 go to SAP E-Recruiting -> Technical settings->User Interfaces->Settings for User Interfaces with Business Server Pages->Assign Parameters to Parameter types. Here for the BSP application: Name hrrcf_qa_screen Parameter type MAX_RDB Parameter Number of Responses with Radio Buttons Questionnaire *(to get the Drop down value restrict or mention the number say* for.e.g:6.If you have defined country scales more than 6 for.e.g:6.If you have defined country scales more than 6 will display in drop down values.Which ever value or scales will display in drop down values.Which ever value or scales defined are more than 6 then it will show in drop down values). defined are more than 6 then it will show in drop down values). Once this configuration is done in portal for your scale which is more than 6 it will display in drop down values. Regards, Selva

data.title: Alter Button from FPM_API dependant on which VC is currently shown?

qas.question: Hi, I want to do the following: The button "SAVE" within FITV_FPM which is shown on a lot of VCs within the Travel Services should bevisible ONLY within FITE_VC_REVIEW. I want this button to be invisible on all other VCs, for example FITE_VC_GENERAL_DATA. visible ONLY within FITE_VC_REVIEW Is there a way over the FPM_API or maybe in WDDOMODIFYVIEW in FITV_FPM which would make this achievable? What I already did was hide the 'EXIT' button in general by doing a post method of WDDOMODIFYVIEW in FITV_FPM Layout View. But here I don't have the problem needing to know "where I am" at the moment VC-wise. Cheers, Lukas

answers.text: Hi Lukas, For hiding "EXIT" button, you should try doing it from Component configuration rather than WDDOMODIFYVIEW in FITV_FPM Layout View. Similarly for the visibility of button "SAVE", i would suggest to locate Component configuration of needed Travel services and then hide from all the VCs. This may be tedious task , however a better option then making changes directly in WDDOMODIFY view. Regards, Ashish Shah

data.title: Show list of AR Invoice which has no Sales Order attached to it

qas.question: Hi, I need to generate a list of AR invoices which created manually in the system and those invoices normally don't have a sales order attach to them (not converted from sales order). Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks! Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks! Regards Regards

answers.text: Hi, Try the below query select v.docnum,v.docdate,v.cardcode,v.CardName from oinv v where v.docentry in (select v1.DocEntry from inv1 v1 where v1.BaseType ='-1')

data.title: How to unblock a row which has been partial received?

qas.question: Dear everyone, I just have a trouble and need anyone help me. Here is the case... There is a PO with a row of 200pcs ordered. Partial of them, say 50pcs, are received. Then what happened on that row is that, as you know, the fields in that row except Qty and 'Del. Date' are all blocked, even for UDF. -- I really need to be able to rewrite info on those UDFs in the row. Is there any way to enable me update data on those UDFs. Thank you Tony

answers.text: Tony, You can try to close the original row in the PO so the open qty will be 0 and add a new row with the outstanding qty with the correct details. Regards, Nat

So now I need a FMS in the UDF U_Code which shows me all the codes which are available (these should be 02 en 03) and select one of these two. Any other solutions will be helpfull as well. Probably I have to create two UDF. In one I can search for the available codes. In the other I can manually enter the code which I want. I would prefer the first solution. Thanks, Tim

data.title: Change company code in WBS which has actual cost posting

qas.question: Hi guys, I have a situation where in i need to change company code in large volume of WBS where there are actual cost posting (not budgeted no need for OPSX). My Company code field in these WBS is in display mode as soon as i do actual cost posting... So obviously MASS change will not work till i make it editable.... How do i do this... regards, Paval.

answers.text: Hi It is not feasible to change company code of WBS once it has postings. This will have a major impact and will lead to inconsistancy. You need to find out possible way out to tackle the situation...one alternative could be to create new project with different comp code and then settle the cost from the old one. But this is possible only if controlling area allowes cross company postings. Regards

data.title: SAP Dependency - Can we use a function in a procedure which returns multiple values?

qas.question: Hello All, We have the following scenario involving material master data classification and dependencies: When a new product is created, a reference code is entered in one of the characteristics. This triggers a dependency where in turn a function is called to obtain/calculate,...a set of values which are then stored as part of the material master's classification data. This is all working fine for single value characteristics, but we also have a few multi-value characteristics. Let's say for example one the characteristics is the multi-value list of colors. Inside the match object of the function we would for example see two records: VARNAM ATFOR ATWRT COLOR CHAR RedCOLOR CHAR Blue In the CU02 dependency we have something like:FUNCTION ZGET_CHARS(......,COLOR = $SELF.COLOR,......) The logic is working fine for single-value characteristics, but not for multi-value characteristics.No errors or dump, but as soon as we return more than one value for a multi-value characteristic, all characteristics that were supposed to be populated are blanked out. Is there a way to make this work for multi-value characteristics? It's key that we can keep the multi-value char on the material master, so we do not want to split it up into COLOR1, COLOR2,.... I no clean solution is found we can set it during saving via the CLFM UE, but then the user doesn't see the result while initially maintaining the product and she would need to enter the material again after saving to see the results. It's an option, but hope there are better ones🙂Thanks in advance,Erik 🙂

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Procedure to capitalised asset which is by mistek expensed out

qas.question: Hi Experts There are some entries which was debited to expenses account. Now we want to capitalised these entries If We pass rectification JV, these records will not apear in Asset Database. Which is the right procedure wherein we can rectify the entry and see the asset in Asset list as well Please Advise Shekhar

answers.text: Hi You can transfer expense to assets. T.Code - FB01 Select document type which allows Asset and GL Posing Debit Posting Key 70 Enter Asset number Select Transaction Type 100 Credit Posting Key 50 Enter Expense Code

data.title: Which NUC system I'm ? MDMP or Ambiguous Blended Code Page or Unambiguous blended code pages ?

qas.question: Dear Experts, We use ecc6 ehp5 non unicode system, we need to make unicode conversion. How can i know the non unicode system i used ? MDMP or Ambiguous Blended Code Page or Unambiguous blended code pages ?

answers.text: Hi Samy, If you are not sure whether your system is a Single Code Page system or not, open database table TCPDB in transaction SE16. If this table contains only one entry, it is a Single Code Page system. If TCPDB contains more than one entry, the system is an MDMP system. see this note 551344 - Unicode Conversion Documentation 551344 - Unicode Conversion Documentation Regards, Regards, Deva Deva

data.title: New characteristic which isn't working in MSC2N ?

qas.question: Hello experts, i had to add a new characteristic (Period Indicator for Shelf Life Expiration Date MARA-IPRKZ) to an existing class 023_PF, so first i created the characteristic in CT04 and i added it in my existing class using CL04 and then i added my characteristic to my exiting function Module in CL67 so i could add my new characteristic in an existing dependency procedure. when i saved teh modifications, i have noticed a weird behaviour, when i modify the Period Indicator for Shelf Life Expiration Date to M(Month) or Y(Year) or W(Week) in Material Master Data MM02 and i check MSC3n classification view it works and i see the new value (Month, year, week) assigned to my characteristic but if i choose D(Days) in MM02, no value is assiged to my characteristic and the function module isn't even executed (Check that using breakpoint). any thoughts please ? Thanks in advance. .1.png2.pngwhen-days-chosen.png 1.png 2.png when-days-chosen.png Best regards,

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Reverse Controlling Document which does not have a Cost Object

qas.question: Hello, We have a scenario where in we have to reverse a controlling document which does not have a Cost Center - What are the possible solutions ? Any thoughts/solutions will be really appreciated. The reason we have this is there was an A/C which did not have a CE earlier, where as now it does have a CE. The document was entered at a stage where it did not have a CE - so the CC was not hit. Now we have to reverse this document and it asks for CC as the A/C now has a CE associated with it. Thanks, Charuni

answers.text: Go to transaction F-02 and click on the "Post with reference" button. ENter the document that you want to reverse and select the button "Generate Reverse posting". Now keep hitting enter until the system tells you to enter a CO object. Enter any cost center and post the document. Note the document number. Now go to SE38 and enter RKACOR20 and execute. Then enter your company code, fiscal year and the document above. Execute this and you should achieve the solution you want.

data.title: reservation for a material which is not having stocks

qas.question: Dear Friends, 1. Kindly tell me whether i can create reservation for a material which is not having stocks ? How to do this ? 2. Can we issue more quantities than in reservation? Kindly help me to do this. Regards, Prasath

answers.text: 1. Kindly tell me whether i can create reservation for a material which is not having stocks ? How to do this ? Try this Go to OMJ1 trxn and put tick for 'Allow Negative stock' for Sto loc Try this Go to OMJ1 trxn and put tick for 'Allow Negative stock' for Sto loc 2. Can we issue more quantities than in reservation? in OMCQ set Message M7 362 Warning or Error , So that you can not issue more than reserved Qty.. in OMCQ set Message M7 362 Warning or Error , So that you can not issue more than reserved Qty..

data.title: For a material components, which cost planing method is better cost calculation

qas.question: Hello all, Our requirement has when we use material components for project,which cost plane method is better for cost calculation of material components. Please suggest. Thanks, prathap,

answers.text: Hi Prathap, It will depend upon are you using network activities and then assigning the Mat. Components to get the plan cost.. or if you use only WBS then unit costing would be way forward.. so how your projects are structured I would suggest for either Network Costing or Unit Costing ... Regards Sammar..

data.title: Preventing goods movements and production orders for materials which don't have a standard price

qas.question: Hello SAP Gurus; When I work with my clients; I confront this situation frecuently. They make some goods movements (purchasing, production etc.) or confirm production orders without calculating standart price of the related material. As you know goods movements or confirmation of production orders can cause a lot of problems later in controlling part for materials which don't have a standart price at the beginnig. I would like to make an implementation (or whatever needs) to prevent making goods movements or confirming production orders if material doesn't have a standart price. I have some ideas; but I couldnt make the final judgement. For example; I can make some restriction using "plant spesific material status section" under costing 1 tab in material master. But how could I create a connection between standart price and goods movements-production orders. Best Regards, sadullah

answers.text: Hi Its very good that you realized this need... There are lot of places where you can put this check.. I have been fortunate enough to put this check at all the places as mentioned below To prevent 1. Goods movement from Purch orders / Sub contracting orders - Use BADIMB_MIGO_ITEM_BADI MB_MIGO_ITEM_BADI 2. Production orders creation/release - Use BADI Workorder_Update 3. Production order confirmation - Use BADI Workorder_Confirm 4. Prod Order goods movement - Use BADI Workorder_Goodsmovement 5. Sales order creation - Use exit MV45AFZZ / ZB 6. PGI (Post Goods Issue to Customer) - Use BADI LE_SHP_DELIVERY_PROC 7. Invoicing (Customer) - Use Exit RV45AFZZ (Not required if you have COPA, you can use costing key to check it) br, Ajay M
